title: NBA Finals Recap & Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
itunes:title: NBA Finals Recap & Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | Showtime Basketball
description:
The 2021-2022 NBA season is officially in the books, as the Golden State Warriors took down the Celtics in the NBA finals to win their 4th championship of the decade. On the latest episode of WHAT'S BURNIN, the boys recap the epic series and discuss the legacies of Steph, Klay & Draymond. Plus, they answer fan questions and talk NBA draft.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
